Class ClientController

public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object

      public void connect​(java.lang.String ip, int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Connects the socket to server and ask the user to login
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip address of the server
      port - the port of the server
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the connection is interrupted

    • lobbyChoice

      public void lobbyChoice​(java.lang.String matchName, int playersNumber)
      Sends to the server the player's choice, whether to create a new match or join an existing one
      Parameters:
      matchName - the name of the match to join (null to create a new match)
      playersNumber - the number of players in the new match (0 or less to join an existing match)
